Country Data

NetHope focused this initial research on the Caribbean countries that tend to be effected by sudden-onset emergencies such as hurricanes, earthquakes, landslides, mudslides, and (more rarely) tsunamis.

  • Antigua and Barbuda
  • Aruba
  • Bahamas
  • Barbados
  • Bermuda
